name: Legend of the Dartwick Steppe
description:
This is a story made for a writing class and is authored by Joey Cianfrani, Andrew Furst, Ian Perkins, and Bryan Wu.

Features

  • Background music (thanks to contributors of freesound.org and zapsplat.com)
  • Scroll up or down by clicking and dragging the story canvas or using a mouse scroll wheel to navigate the story text canvas
  • Story canvas automatically scrolls down as text is generated
  • Left-click to skip text-typing animations
  • Access the settings menu from the top right that features resume, restart, and credits functions
  • Credits screen

Description

Have you ever wanted to live out your hero fantasy or save the world from ever encroaching doom?

Now you can with the brand new game Legend of the Dartwick Steppe.

Set in a fantasy world, you get to choose how you proceed. Will you get the chance to live forever in Chestnut Grove? Or will you scum to the might of Cora and her environmental mayhem.
